entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish to Windows Store (Side Loading) of Maui app fails when a .NETStandard 2.1 library is referenced. #26485
  • Simplify the starter template #26484
  • Survey! Let us know how we are doing in the repo! #26482
    .NET 9 SR3
  • DisplayAlert/ActionSheet Fails on Windows, Android, and Mac #26481
  • [WINDOWS]SearchHandler Fails to Display Results on Windows #26477
    Backlog
  • Flyout menu (Hamburger menu) appears "out of nowhere" when BackbuttonBehaviour is defined (Android only) #26470
    .NET 9 SR3

Closed

  • [WinUI] Displaying an `ActionSheet` does not expand #22885
    Backlog
  • emulator chashes when dragged on second screen #26211
  • [MAUI] error NETSDK1082 & error 'XAPRAS7004 will happen when solution name with "()" or solution in directories with “()” #26092
    Backlog
  • Build stuck on Extracting Extracting ...\XamarinBuildDownloadCache\GMps-9.1.1.tgz to ...\XamarinBuildDownloadCache\GMps-9.1.1 #26045
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS, ANDROID] FlyoutIsPresented is not working as expected on Android and Windows when navigating between FlyoutItems #26422
  • [Android] SearchHandler.Focused event never fires #24670
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fix DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #24914
    Backlog
  • Android FlyoutPage does not display navigation bar NET 8 #26472
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync() - When popping a modal page off the stack and app loses focus - Modal Page does not leave the UI. #26418
  • The LeadingContent of the TitleBar appears before the App Info section. #26378
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] D13_ The background color is inconsistent and varies in light and dark colors. #26356
  • CarouselView EmptyView not visible initially #11847
    Backlog
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24966
    Backlog
  • [Android] `RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand` of `CarouselView` is not triggered #24571
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Error while completing the steps for Maui App, please help #26363
  • iOS - OnNavigatedFrom is not fired when navigating back by swiping #26216
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Warning due to implementation of "performFetchWithCompletionHandler" although "PerformFetch" was not implemented #26462
  • How to Enable Zoom Feature for BlazorWebView MAUI Hybrid on Android? #26457
  • HttpClient GET Api is failing with {System.IO.IOException: Connection reset ---> Java.Net.SocketException: Connection reset error in .NET MAUI Android #26147

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241209202058740 to main #26483
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10679157 #26479
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] ScrollView - Setting SetClipChildren to false #26475
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #26474
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Correct Button EventHandler signature in template #26473
    area-templates
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 38 #26469
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix Incorrect First and Last Visible Item index in CollectionView Scrolled Event #26468
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Revert "[release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages" #26478
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR3
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Set up MauiGResources for Localization #26412
    area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241206202628657 to main #26444
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Add missing android font weight #26450
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand of CarouselView is not triggered #25574
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Added DidPopItem to the navigation renderer #26235
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3

Updated

  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/1, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR3
  • Cleans up the blank starter template #26448
    area-templates, community ✨
  • Fix and verify shadow / shape / clip #24941
    area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Nested Flex Layouts #25036
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, layout-flex
  • Improve performance of rendering `DatePicker` #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-theme, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Flyout reset during Detail update #26425
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [NO_MERGE] WIP: Testing iossim hangs #25467
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] [Mac] Fix for Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26222
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
    area-infrastructure
  • [SECURITY] `Microsoft.Sbom.Targets` nuget for package SBOM #26093
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix for TabbedPage - ScrollView not allowing scrolling when it should #26217
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #26325
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [XC] Add support for DoesNotInheritDataTypeAttribute to XamlC #26359
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fix Gray Line Appears on the Right Side of GraphicsView with Decimal WidthRequest #26368
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for ListView ScrollTo Method throws NullReferenceException #26385
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399
    community ✨, area-controls-checkbox, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [Android] Click on flyout clicks on page behind - fix #26461
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [XC] fix excessive boxing #26465
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR3
  • Sample Content template: changed currentTheme value with RequestedTheme property. #26424
    area-templates, community ✨
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button with shell pages - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix memory leak with GroupedItemTemplateCollection #23386
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix iOS] Fix CarouselViewLoopNoFreeze so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #26053
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer - fix #25960
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Only return path to font file if it exists, otherwise copy it again. Fixes #16923 #16924
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Fixed CollectionView reordering last item #17825
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, stale
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 37 #26437
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - UI-Test #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 36 #26436
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer - fix #26456
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-core-platform
